title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16 ยง 898.1 - Prohibition
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16 ยง 898.1 - Prohibition

State Regulations

Except as provided in section
898.2
of this Part, no landlord
shall demand or accept any payment from any cable television company in
exchange for permitting cable television service or facilities on or within
said landlord's property or premises. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16
ยง
898.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
